title: Media exchange for 3D cell culture
author: Opentrons
description:
Wash 3D cell culture with PBS, replace with fresh culture medium.

PBS - 1st well of trough
Culture medium = 2nd well of trough

markdown.title: Media exchange for 3D cell culture
markdown.author: [Opentrons](https://opentrons.com/)
markdown.description:
Wash 3D cell culture with PBS, replace with fresh culture medium.

* PBS - 1st well of trough
* Culture medium = 2nd well of trough
